response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you and am excited to share it with you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this remarkable product at a price of $1,350,000. I believe this amount strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your perceived worth, allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product's features and benefits. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 1350000}
